How We Work

We believe in having a happy and fun work environment - one that helps to focus ourselves with the tasks and challenges ahead. Play Hard - Work Harder.

1

Brainstorm

We take our clients requirements and sketch out the project on a whiteboard. We brainstorm ideas and identify what technologies we can use.

2

Early Development

When we identify the technolgies required we'll then draft flowcharts and pseudo code. Then we'll implement the base code.

3

Beta Stage

We develop the code, testing along the way, looking for those bugs and getting the project ready for Beta.

4

Documentation

Once the project has been tested thoroughly and exposed to a sandbox environment we then process the project documentation and then handover.
